ygData.subject: RE: Castle Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: a 50 druid friend and i held the tower all day once after getting me my first waki way back.  he fell asleep, which i realized after 50 Shada tells the group,
ygData.messageBody:
a 50 druid friend and i held the tower all day once after getting me my
first waki way back. he fell asleep, which i realized after 50 "Shada tells
the group, HEY!!!!!"s as the room started respawning. stupid me i didn't
want him to die, so i start fighting stuff. i was so scared at the time, i
got my ass kicked by the first one, lost 3 bubbs of health when the second
one spawns, and the first one was still alive. so i got two on me and down
to 1 bubb of health when i kill the first and a 3rd spawns. then i remember
seeing a druid friend in the zone. i start screaming in tell "COME TO TOWER
NOW GONNA DIE!" as i am fighting the other two. the whole time i am fearing
the crap out of everything. i kill the second one and am down to 1/2 bubb
of health. down to 1 left and i hear him in the hall below me, saying he is
here and i am screaming "UP UP UP" and finally he clicks on the little lift
mechanism, nukes the last one and heals me at 1/4 bubb life. you're right
Harm, that kind of stuff is very fun ;) luckily i was group leader and
invited him to drop my fool friend off in lavastorm.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L38 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> I was fearing away all the mobs, waiting for a heal.
>
> It was probably one of the best nights I've had in a while.
> Well, if the dhampyre would have dropped me a cloak, I would
> have been much much happier.
>
> Harmonic.
